sentences.en: Far off to the west the sun was sinking.
For added protection choose a lipstick with a sun screen.
sentences.cn: 选择防晒护唇膏来增强保护。

sentences.en: His nose had been reddened by unaccustomed exposure to the California sun.
sentences.cn: 经过加州阳光不同寻常的照射，他的鼻子晒红了。

sentences.en: It is a mild morning and the sun is shining.
sentences.cn: 这是个和煦的早晨，阳光普照。

sentences.en: It was hot, nearly 90 degrees in the noonday sun.
sentences.cn: 天很热，正午的阳光下，温度高达近90华氏度。

sentences.en: Its leaves drooped a little in the fierce heat of the sun.
sentences.cn: 它的叶子在灼热的阳光下微微耷拉着。

sentences.en: John and Isabelle moved apart, back into the sun.
sentences.cn: 约翰和伊莎贝拉彼此分开，回到了阳光下。

sentences.en: People can keep out of the sun to avoid skin cancer.
sentences.cn: 人们可以通过避免阳光照射来预防皮肤癌。

sentences.en: Silhouetted against the sun stood the figure of a man.
sentences.cn: 阳光映衬出一名男子的轮廓。

sentences.en: The fashion-conscious will go for anything under the sun!
The people sleep on sun loungers packed tight, end to end.
sentences.cn: 人们躺在首尾相连、密密排在一起的日光浴床上。

sentences.en: The sky was blue and the sun was shining.
The washing might dry outside today, the sun's shining.
sentences.cn: 洗过的衣物可能今天晾在外面就能干，阳光正足。

sentences.en: They are grown on the hillsides in full sun, without much water.
sentences.cn: 它们被种植在阳光充足、土壤水分不多的山坡上。

sentences.en: They watched the sun set behind the distant dales.
sentences.cn: 他们望着夕阳没入远处的山谷。

sentences.en: We sat there for hours talking about everything under the sun.
sentences.cn: 我们在那儿坐了几个小时，谈天说地。

words.tran_cn: 阳光照射不到的，阴暗的
阳光充足的，和煦的；快活的；性情开朗的
阳光照射，阳光充足；活泼

phrases.tran_cn: (航海)在北半球）朝着与太阳视动方向相反的方向；从右向左，逆时针方向地

phrases.phrase: make hay while the sun shines
on which the sun never sets

phrases.tran_cn: 好的境遇；有太阳的地方
活着；出生；发现太阳的耀眼
(航海)测太阳高度以确定纬度
(航海)（在北半球）朝着与太阳视动方向相同的方向；从左向右，顺时针方向地

trans.tran_cn: 太阳，阳光，恒星，中心人物
trans.tran_en: the large bright object in the sky that gives us light and heat, and around which the Earth moves
to sit or lie outside when the sun is shining
